Phishing detection plays a pivital role in enuring the safety of individuals and organizations from the pervasive threat of cybercrime!

How to prevent attacks?

To help prevent from phishing attacks, individuals and organizations should cultivate a culture of skepticism towards unsolicited emails, messages, or links. ALWAYS VERIFY LEGITIMACY BEFORE CLICKING!!
